channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Did Democrats’ ‘Nonpartisan’ Voter Outreach Violate IRS Rules?
item.description: Putatively nonpartisan charitable voter registration and mobilization organizations are thinly veiled Democrat vote-generation vehicles.

item.title: East Asia’s Political Turmoil Could Hamper Trump’s Bid To Counter Red China
item.description: The Trump admin's efforts to get America's East Asian partners to increase defense spending may prove more difficult than anticipated.

item.title: Slashing the Intelligence Office Workforce Is Just a Start
item.description: Creating the Office of the Director of National Intelligence was a mistake. Short of its being erased, it needs to be streamlined and reformed.

item.title: In the Age of AI, some tech leaders think communications degrees may actually be more valuable than computer science degrees
item.description: Can a two-year ‘problem-solving pool’ solve AI replacing entry-level jobs? This C-suite executive thinks so.

item.title: What Jamieson Greer Gets Wrong About Trump’s New Trade System
item.description: The U.S. trade representative’s New York Times article defending Trump’s trade policy makes several grievous errors.

item.title: Japanese Internment: The Other 80th Anniversary to Remember
item.description: The moral and constitutional failure was not Roosevelt’s alone.

item.title: Should We Have Allied with Hitler?
item.description: ‘Just asking questions’ makes its dumbest query yet.

item.title: Red Lobster’s CEO on weighing the risks and rewards of a turnaround role
item.description: Red Lobster chief Damola Adamolekun explains the career calculus behind saying yes to leading companies in crisis.

item.title: Trump to sign executive order to eliminate no-cash bail for DC suspects
item.description: The Trump administration is moving to end cashless bail policies in Washington D.C. and across the country as part of broader crime reduction efforts.

item.title: Blessing in a Box
item.description: Safe-haven baby boxes offer hope to desperate mothers.

item.description: Our country would be better off with a return to the gold standard: voting in-person on Election Day.
